reviews.review:
1. o l4d eh bom pra quem curte um ngc mais purista, pq o jogo eh mais sombrio doq o seu sucessor l4d2.
2. esse jogo nao contem dois infectados especiais que sao ineditos do segundo jogo, eles sao a spitter e o jockey, sendo esse ultimo o bicho mais chato de todos.
3. as armas possuem mais muniçoes ent vc pode atirar a vontade e dificilmente vai ficar sem, isso acontece pq n existem meele no jogo, oq em si eh um ponto bastante negativo, mas eh mto mais divertido descarregar um pente chad com mta muniçao doq ficar com um virgin axe matando zumbizinho (infelizmente n tem a chad chainsaw)
4. infelizmente o jogo n tem workshop, e isso eh o que mais mata ele, soq tem como baixar mods por fora em sites mas convenhamos q eh um saco ficar mexendo com as files dele, mto melhor apertar 1 botao e ja instalar varios models de traps como personagem jogavel.
5. como todo mundo sempre diz, n vale mto a pena ja que todas as campanhas e personagens estao inclusas no l4d2, o jogo vai msm de vc ser um cara mais purista. Geralmente quem joga o l4d1 tbm eh gente q conhece mais o jogo e tem os mesmos gostos puristas q o seu ent vc pode ate fazer um amigo olha soh.
fantastic game played when i was younger absoulty loved it played it again when i was older still hold up and still a great game definite buy

Left 4 Dead or L4D1 is a great game but how does it hold up till this day, well it's a bit easier then L4D2 but it's bot ai is useless so play with friends when it comes to survival,campaign&versus.

There are five special infected those being: Tank,Witch,Hunter,Smoker&Boomer. The game itself has more atmosphere then L4D2, Left 4 Dead 2 favors gameplay over feel so l4d2 is a bit more tedious in certain parts.

The weapons are:Pistols,Pump shotgun,Auto shotgun,Assault rifle,Hunting rifle,Sub machine gun.
Left 4 Dead has throwables they are:Pipe bomb,Molotov.

On a side note the versus community is not fun to play with prepare to be kicked all the time, no matter how good you play.
Muy buen juego, ademas de que corre en una tostadora con carbón
Really entertaining for a hack and slash type game. keeps the interest.
Singleplayer AI has a lot of flaws
muito bom o jogo , e roda em qualquer  computador
good collaborative fun for a party of friends. also very light on graphics so u dont need a mega computer to play it
ตำนานของตำนาน
it is a very fun game
Muy bueno, vicio puro y duro como el tanker!
es un muy buen juego que puedes jugar con tus amigos y otras personas de diversos lugares
Excellent with friends and online players.
самая любимая игра, ну 2 часть тоже.

This is a zombie game.
Dear god!
There's more.
No!

Я обожаю эту игру! 
Она просто великолепна. Она одновременно и мультиплеерная и хоррор, очень хороший хоррор.
Но один минус: почти все игроки, с которыми я играл, были пиздетски токсичными и каждый раз меня убивали. А я то не плохо - то играю, иду на 1-вом месте, даже играю только на тяжёлом или эксперте (ну на эксперте я часто просираю, приврал чу-чуть).
Если вы хотите играть именно в первую часть этой серии нормально - играйте в патти, а так лучше идите во вторую гонять. Там онлайн по-больше, да и токсиков поменьше.
БЛИН СТРАШНА КАПЕЦ. зашол в игру напугался и удолил. Зря толька денги патратил не саветую (Серёжа 9 лет)
this game is so fun +u can play with friends and have memories
Es divertido y tienen diversas campañas
un juego con buena historia que te hace sentir en un verdadero apocalipsis,aparte es divertido jugar con amigos ,yo no eh tenido problemas con el juego la verdad 10/10
too many zombies but it was fun
Really good classic horde zombie action that can run on very basic pc.

ootko nähny cursen dessu klipin cachessa ite valehtelematta nähny sen yli sata kertaa ja pakko sanoa että on kyllä kova atk pelaaja näin sen kerran pelikentil ja oli kyl pakko pyytää signausta profiili ei se turhaa oo maailman parhaimmistoa
es bueno facil de jugar no cuesta tanto tener una pc bueno
old but a amazing game !!! we all love <3
Одна из игр валв которая входит в топ лучших.
Me parece un juego muy divertido y con unas dinamicas muy buenas.

I recommend this game because this game never bothers, because of the mechanics of the spawn mobs, there are also interesting modes, such as survival, where you can pump your survival skill. Particularly suitable for those who want to find a game to play with a friend. I love this game in spite of the fact that it is far from new, I have a lot of memories connected with it. So I recommend everyone to feel this atmosphere and indulge in a spirit of despair.


Я рекомендую эту игру потому что эта игра никогда не надоедает, из-за механики спауна мобов, также есть интересные режимы, например выживание, там ты сможешь прокачать свой навык выживания. Особенно подойдет тем кто хочет найти игру чтобы поиграть с другом. Я обожаю эту игру не смотря на то что она далеко не новая, у меня связано с ней куча воспоминаний. Так что рекомендую всем ощутить эту атмосферу и  духом безысходности.

L4D

Pro každého kdo už čeká na postapo nutností. :D V této hře se vyřádíte. Zombie kam se podíváš, skvělá hratelnost, parádní multiplayer.
Круто, только смысл покупать, если весь контент в этой игре есть во второй части.
求生之路这款游戏我还记得，在以前学校里上电脑课的时候偷偷打开来玩，玩的时候还要时不时注意老师的动向，怕万一发现被老师骂。也可以说是我童年上电脑课的回忆啊，想想那时候也蛮开心的。

A fun game with friends, a good challenge in expert mode which requires lots of coordinated teamwork for passing levels. Also shotguns 1 hit kill teammates, my mate somehow ended up with 50 instances of friendly fire after a campaign.
Maravillosa historia, un gameplay frenético y muy duro

Now this game is made by the same developers that made counterstrike source. Which in my opinion its counterstrike source, but with zombies instead,and the versus mode is when you can play as the zombies. This game is now 11 years old. And still holds up in my opinion, its a very good shooter. I reccomend it to anyone who likes counterstrike, Servers are still up, so thats a good sign.

I just bought it on pc but, i used to play console.
If you want to scream at npcs buy this game
Wanna shoot Zombies, Buy this game.
Wanna have a good time with friends, Buy this game. 
It's old but it is good,  
If you like L4D2, Buy this game!
Except for Dead Air, Dead Air sucks
It is a classic game! Must play. L4D2 is even better!
is a fun game is not bad but it has crappy pepole some times
Es alto juegazo, alta infancia trae este game
Fun, balanced zombie survival/ escape game. Equally enjoyable when playing with friends, random players online, or even by yourself. The characters are fun and have a lot personality.
This is a Must Have game for your library... nuf said.
Small amount of maps but great fun and brilliant co op experience
